comment._content: luirig.altervista.org/cpm/albums/bain-21/10475-Billy-Gibs... This is a yet-to-be-Flickred photo of Ritchie and a guy named Leonard Hicks, among others. I suspect he's the "Mr. L Hicks", but I can't find any explanation of their connection.
